comment: I dont know how they could still even be in business after so many people got cancer and died from one of their products. I will never trust them with anything ever again
amr:
# ::snt I dont know how they could still even be in business after so many people got cancer and died from one of their products. I will never trust them with anything ever again
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (k / know-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (t / thing
                  :manner-of (p / possible-01
                        :ARG1 (b / business
                              :mod (s / still)
                              :domain (t2 / they)
                              :time (a / after
                                    :op1 (a2 / and
                                          :op1 (g / get-01
                                                :ARG0 (p2 / person
                                                      :ARG1-of (h / have-quant-91
                                                            :ARG2 (m2 / many)
                                                            :ARG3 (s2 / so)))
                                                :ARG1 (d / disease
                                                      :name (n / name
                                                            :op1 "cancer")))
                                          :op2 (d2 / die-01
                                                :ARG1 p2
                                                :ARG1-of (c / cause-01
                                                      :ARG0 (p3 / product
                                                            :quant 1
                                                            :ARG1-of (ii2 / include-91
                                                                  :ARG2 (p4 / product
                                                                        :poss t2)))))))))))
      :snt2 (t3 / trust-02
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (ii3 / i)
            :ARG1 (a3 / anything)
            :ARG2 (t4 / they)
            :time (e / ever)
            :mod (a4 / again
                  :mod e)))

comment: Because of their range of baby products I always thought J&J was a good ethical company. Seems I was wrong.
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (t / think-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (c / company
                  :ARG1-of (g / good-02)
                  :mod (e / ethics)
                  :domain (c2 / company
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "J&amp"
                              :op2 "&"
                              :op3 "J")))
            :time (a / always)
            :ARG1-of (c3 / cause-01
                  :ARG0 (r / range-01
                        :ARG1 (p / product
                              :mod (b / baby))
                        :poss c2)))
      :snt2 (s / seem-01
            :ARG1 (w / wrong-04
                  :ARG1 ii)))
